title: Loggin onto chat service
body:
So as problem say, i cant join the chat at all nor i can see my friend list or anything.  Only chat i can see is ingam chat.

Notice :
Its not problem by my side, nor i have poor internet connection or  something like that, it started today tought it ll fix itself but it wont.

Any solution for this ?

Edit : If staff could answer why huge amount of bugs only happening to EUNE server ?

replies.body: Well that s an amazing feedback.

My internet is really good aswell, never lag or something. I play CS GO a lot and i never lag. It all started when i got chat restricted. So I dunno if it's a coincidence or if Riot is doing some sneaky shit to me xD

This is most often caused by routing issues specifically to the chat servers. Because different servers reside in different geolocations, you can have a good connection to one but not another. I strongly recommend ensuring your local network settings are compatible with our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) before we look into your routing.

Let me know if you notice any changes after taking those steps.
I also need help. I've tried changing my DNS and re-downloading the game. Someone said that changing password would solve it, but it didn't. No one answerd on my post either :/
